subject: Football
Relocation of Business
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L.’s decision to allow the St. Louis Rams to move to Los Angeles symbolizes a changing of the guard that may have a lasting impact on how the league operates.
snippet: The N.F.L.’s decision to allow the St. Louis Rams to move to Los Angeles symbolizes a changing of the guard that may have a lasting impact on how the league operates.
